mainBrag: Welcome to Web Demo build by Group 1 in collaboration with Anggoro-Corp. This is a web demo build with Laravel 8 Framework. This demo is build to fulfill the Final Test Semester of subject Kelas Perancangan dan Pemrograman WEB (IST 102) A.

dbOntheFly: Automatically create database on the fly without import or migrate database.
